mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NM, PRODUCT_QUANTITY, PRODUCT_SPEC FROM FINISHED_PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID ASC

SELECT I.LOT_ID, (SELECT E1.EMP_NM FROM EMPLOYEES E1 WHERE E1.EMP_ID = I.INST_ID) AS INST_NM, I.PRODUCT_ID, I.LOT_SIZE, I.OUTPUT, TO_CHAR(I.INST_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS INST_DATE, TO_CHAR(I.MANU_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS MANU_DATE, (SELECT E2.EMP_NM FROM EMPLOYEES E2 WHERE E2.EMP_ID = I.MANU_ID) AS MANU_NM, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT M.LOT_ID FROM MANUFACTURING M WHERE M.LOT_ID = I.LOT_ID) THEN '미완료' ELSE '완료' END AS COMPLETION FROM INSTRUCTION I ORDER BY I.LOT_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INSTRUCTION ( LOT_ID, INST_ID, PRODUCT_ID, LOT_SIZE, INST_DATE) VALUES ( seq_instruction.nextval, #{inst_id}, #{product_id}, #{lot_size}, #{inst_date})
